## FirstParameter type

返回函数 T 第一个参数的类型。

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare type FirstParameter<T extends (...args: any[]) => any> = Head<Parameters<T>>;
```

## Example


```typescript
type F = (x: string, y: number) => any
type X = FirstParameter<F> // => string

```
